title: Please ID this typeface
content:
Hi all -  
Any help identifying this font much appreciated!

Cheers - !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cbus\_2008.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160309/http:/typophile.com/files/cbus_2008.jpg) | 42.72 KB |

 [‹ New York magazine bold geometric sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160309/http:/typophile.com/node/19539 "Go to previous forum topic") [Two fonts ID -- flourish and serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160309/http:/typophile.com/node/45229 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pbags

comments.content: Looks like a brutally chopped up Lucida Sans.

Looks like it is, I cant help but think that the counters of the ’p’, ’o’, and the ’r’ is defiantly different...  
I was thinking more Frutigar, but its not... Its a stitch up! : ) Bit of everything...

\_\_  
Rez
